content: acorn bag crochet pattern skill level advanced beginner materials required ❖ crochet hook g-7 4 5mm ❖ crochet hook i-9 5 5mm ❖ yarn needle ❖ scissors ❖ stitch marker ❖ beige yarn……… medium #4 worsted yarn 135 - 175 yards 2 - 2 5 oz ❖ dark brown yarn……… medium #4 worsted yarn 135 - 175 yards 2 - 2 5 oz ❖ any yarn and color can be used for the oak leaves each leaf takes approximately 11 yards 0 14 oz if using #4 yarn different size yarns will make a different size leaf 1 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said documents are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole it is prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes thank you for respecting copyright laws notes ❖ the yarn i used and that s pictured is bernat super value acrylic yarn in colors heather brown & dark heather for the acorn ❖ this pattern was written for both the top and bottom of the acorn to be made with the same size thickness yarn if the yarn or hook size is dramatically different than the pattern indicates - the acorn top will not fit to the bottom as intended of course the acorn can be made with different yarn than the pattern as long as the top and bottom are made with the same size yarn ❖ the yarn amounts stated for this pattern only apply of you re using the same size yarn as the pattern the weight and amount of yarn necessary varies if you use different size yarn or hook and also depending on your gauge adjust your hook size for different yarn 3dc-cluster 5dc-cluster 2 copyright mysimplicitiesbymn 2025 all rights reserved all documents and pictures in said documents are property of megan nelson mysimplicitiesbymn no part of this publication may be reproduced and/or redistributed in any way part or whole it is prohibited to use my patterns for commercial purposes thank you for respecting copyright laws abbreviations us terms r 1 …… row or round number ml…… magic loop or magic_ring single_crochet…… single_crochet 1 …… the number of stitches in the finished row or round half_double_crochet…… half-double_crochet double_crochet…… double_crochet bold lettering…… the stitches to do for that round treble_crochet…… treble_crochet the stitches between brackets → is blo…… back loops only the stitch or sequence of stitches to increase…… increase 2 stitches in one space repeat the indicated amount of times decrease…… decrease invisible decrease x1…… the necessary amount of times to decrease…… single_crochet 2 together repeat a sequence of stitches st…… stitch or stitches additional information is in colored parenthesis slip_stitch…… slip_stitch double_crochet-cluster…… double_crochet cluster stitch space…… space yo insert hook into space yo draw up a skip…… skip loop yo and pull through 2 loops yo and repeat same steps into the same space chain…… chain until you have the necessary
